00035 #define MAXBASISSTATES 100

00037 
00038 void writeprojectedOvlaps(FILE* fp,
00039                          const Projection* P,
00040                          const complex double** ovlap,
00041                          const Eigenstates* E)
00042 {
00043   int odd=P->odd;
00044   int jmax=P->jmax;
00045 
00046   int p,j,i;
00047 
00048   char prefix[8];
00049 
00050   int* idx;
00051   int ngood;
00052   complex double *norm;
00053   complex double *H, *Ovlap;
00054   
00055 
00056   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00057     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00058       
00059       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00060 
00061       if (ngood) {
00062 
00063         if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00064         else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00065 
00066         idx = E->index[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00067         norm = E->norm[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00068         H = E->v[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00069 
00070         Ovlap = ovlap[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00071 
00072         fprintf(fp, "\n%s N     = ", prefix); 
00073         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00074           fprintf(fp, "   %8.5f", creal(norm[idx[i]]));
00075         fprintf(fp, "\n%s H     = ", prefix); 
00076         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00077           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", hbc*creal(H[idx[i]]));
00078         fprintf(fp, "\n%s Specf = ", prefix); 
00079         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00080           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", creal(Ovlap[idx[i]]/norm[idx[i]]));
00081         fprintf(fp, "\n");        
00082       }
00083     }
00084 }

00087 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00088 {
00089   createinfo(argc, argv);
00090 
00091   /* enough arguments ? */
00092 
00093   if (argc < 2) {
00094     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s mcstate basistates\n"
00095             "-p ANGPARA         projection parameters for overlap matrix elements"
00096             "-t THRESH          threshold for inversion\n", 
00097             argv[0]);
00098     exit(-1);
00099   }
00100 
00101   char* angparovl = NULL;
00102   double thresh=1e-5;
00103 
00104   int c;
00105   while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "p:t:")) != -1)
00106     switch (c) {
00107     case 'p':
00108       angparovl = optarg;
00109       break;
00110     case 't':   
00111       thresh = atof(optarg);
00112       break;
00113     }
00114 
00115   char* multiconfigfile = argv[optind];
00116   char** mbfile;
00117 
00118   // open multiconfigfile
00119   Projection Pstate;
00120   Projection Povl;
00121   MultiSlaterDet* Q;
00122   Indices* In;
00123   Eigenstates E;
00124   int n;
00125 
00126   if (readMultiMulticonfigfile(multiconfigfile, &mbfile, &Pstate, &Q, &In, &n, &E))
00127     exit(-1);
00128 
00129   if (angparovl) {
00130     int odd = Q[0].A % 2;
00131     initProjection(&Povl, odd, angparovl);
00132   } else
00133     Povl = Pstate;
00134 
00135   char* basisfile = argv[optind+1];
00136   char* mbbfile[MAXBASISSTATES];
00137   int nb;
00138 
00139   if (readstringsfromfile(basisfile, &nb, mbbfile))
00140     exit(-1);
00141 
00142   MultiSlaterDet Qb[nb]; 
00143   Indices Inb[nb];
00144 
00145   int i;
00146   for (i=0; i<nb; i++) {
00147     extractIndicesfromString(&mbbfile[i], &Inb[i]);
00148     if (readMultiSlaterDetfromFile(&Qb[i], &Inb[i], mbbfile[i]))
00149       exit(-1);
00150   }
00151 
00152 
00153   // calculate overlaps for basis states
00154  
00155   complex double*** ovlbbme[nb*nb];
00156 
00157   int a,b;
00158   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00159     for (a=0; a<nb; a++)
00160       ovlbbme[a+b*nb] = initprojectedMultiMBME(&Povl, &OpOvlap, &Qb[a], &Qb[b]);
00161 
00162   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00163     for (a=0; a<nb; a++) {
00164       if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbbfile[a], mbbfile[b], 
00165                                          &Qb[a], &Qb[b],
00166                                          &Povl, &OpOvlap, ovlbbme[a+b*nb])) {
00167         calcprojectedMultiMBME(&Povl, &OpOvlap, &Qb[a], &Qb[b], ovlbbme[a+b*nb]);
00168         writeprojectedMultiMBMEtoFile(mbbfile[a], mbbfile[b], &Qb[a], &Qb[b],
00169                                       &Povl, &OpOvlap, ovlbbme[a+b*nb]);
00170       }
00171     }
00172 
00173   // calculate overlaps between eigenstate and basis states
00174 
00175   complex double*** ovlbme[n*nb];
00176   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00177     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00178       ovlbme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMultiMBME(&Povl, &OpOvlap, &Q[a], &Qb[b]);
00179 
00180   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00181     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00182       if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbbfile[b], 
00183                                          &Q[a], &Qb[b],
00184                                          &Povl, &OpOvlap, ovlbme[a+b*n])) {
00185         calcprojectedMultiMBME(&Povl, &OpOvlap, &Q[a], &Qb[b], ovlbme[a+b*n]);
00186         writeprojectedMultiMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbbfile[b], &Q[a], &Qb[b],
00187                                       &Povl, &OpOvlap, ovlbme[a+b*n]);
00188       }
00189     }
00190 
00191 
00192   // evaluate matrix elements of one-operator
00193   // implement Symmetries !
00194 
00195   ManyBodyOperator OpOne = {
00196     name : "One",
00197     rank : 0,
00198     pi : 0,
00199     dim : 1,
00200     size: 1,
00201     par : NULL,
00202     me : NULL
00203   };
00204 
00205   // use full set of basis states (all J,M,K projections)
00206   // using K mixing eigenstates would require to solve the
00207   // eigenvalue problem for each basis state
00208 
00209   int jmax = Povl.jmax;
00210 
00211   complex double*** oneme[n*n];
00212   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00213     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00214       oneme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMultiMBME(&Povl, &OpOne, &Q[a], &Q[b]);
00215 
00216   int dim=0;
00217   for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00218     dim += In[i].N;
00219 
00220   // use only selected basis states
00221   int dimb=0;
00222   for (i=0; i<nb; i++)
00223     dimb += Inb[i].n;
00224 
00225   complex double *nbbwork = malloc(SQR((jmax+1)*dimb)*sizeof(complex double));
00226   complex double *obbwork = malloc(SQR((jmax+1)*dimb)*sizeof(complex double));
00227   complex double *obbcovlwork = malloc(SQR(jmax+1)*dimb*dim*sizeof(complex double));
00228 
00229   // loop over parity and angular momenta
00230 
00231   fprintf(stderr, "... preparing basis-one operator\n");
00232 
00233   int p,j,idx;
00234   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00235     for (j=Povl.odd; j<Povl.jmax; j=j+2) {
00236       idx = idxpij(Povl.jmax, p, j);
00237 
00238       // calculate overlap matrix
00239 
00240       fprintf(stderr, "\tj: %d, p: %d basis overlap matrix\n", j, p);
00241 
00242       complex double (*nbb)[(j+1)*dimb] = nbbwork;
00243       int ab,abp,idxab,bb,bbp,idxbb,kab,kbb;
00244 
00245       idxbb=-1;
00246       for (bb=0; bb<nb; bb++)
00247         for (bbp=0; bbp<Inb[bb].n; bbp++){
00248           idxbb++;
00249           for (kbb=-j; kbb<=j; kbb=kbb+2) {
00250             idxab=-1;
00251             for (ab=0; ab<nb; ab++)
00252               for (abp=0; abp<Inb[ab].n; abp++) {
00253                 idxab++;
00254                 for (kab=-j; kab<=j; kab=kab+2) {
00255 
00256                   nbb[idxjm(j,kab)+idxab*(j+1)][idxjm(j,kbb)+idxbb*(j+1)] = 
00257                     ovlbbme[ab+bb*nb][Inb[ab].idx[abp]+Inb[bb].idx[bbp]*Inb[ab].N][idx][idxjmk(j,kab,kbb)];
00258 
00259                 }
00260               }
00261           }
00262         }
00263       
00264       // invert overlap matrix
00265 
00266       complex double (*obb)[(j+1)*dimb] = obbwork;
00267       pseudoinverse(nbb, obb, (j+1)*dimb, thresh);
00268 
00269       // calculate one operator matrix element
00270 
00271       fprintf(stderr, "\tj: %d, p: %d basis one matrix\n", j, p);
00272 
00273       complex double (*obbcovl)[dim*(j+1)] = obbcovlwork;
00274 
00275       int ap,bp,idxa,idxb,ka,kb;
00276 
00277       idxb=-1;
00278       for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00279         for (bp=0; bp<In[b].N; bp++) {
00280           idxb++;
00281 
00282           idxab=-1;
00283           for (ab=0; ab<nb; ab++)
00284             for (abp=0; abp<Inb[ab].n; abp++) {
00285               idxab++;
00286               
00287               for (kb=-j; kb<=j; kb=kb+2)
00288                 for (kab=-j; kab<=j; kab=kab+2) {
00289                   obbcovl[idxjm(j,kab)+idxab*(j+1)][idxjm(j,kb)+idxb*(j+1)] = 0.0;
00290 
00291                   idxbb=-1;
00292                   for (bb=0; bb<nb; bb++)
00293                     for (bbp=0; bbp<Inb[bb].n; bbp++) {
00294                       idxbb++;
00295                       for (kbb=-j; kbb<=j; kbb=kbb+2)
00296                         obbcovl[idxjm(j,kab)+idxab*(j+1)][idxjm(j,kb)+idxb*(j+1)] +=
00297                           obb[idxjm(j,kab)+idxab*(j+1)][idxjm(j,kbb)+idxbb*(j+1)]*
00298                           conj(ovlbme[b+n*bb][bp+Inb[bb].idx[bbp]*In[b].N][idx][idxjmk(j,kb,kbb)]);
00299                     }
00300                 }
00301             }
00302         }
00303 
00304       idxb=-1;
00305       for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00306         for (bp=0; bp<In[b].N; bp++) {
00307           idxb++;
00308 
00309           for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00310             for (ap=0; ap<In[a].N; ap++) {
00311               idxa++;
00312 
00313               for (kb=-j; kb<=j; kb=kb+2)
00314                 for (ka=-j; ka<=j; ka=ka+2) {
00315 
00316                   oneme[a+b*n][ap+bp*In[a].N][idx][idxjmk(j,ka,kb)] = 0.0;
00317 
00318                   idxab=-1;
00319                   for (ab=0; ab<nb; ab++)
00320                     for (abp=0; abp<Inb[ab].n; abp++) {
00321                       idxab++;
00322                       for (kab=-j; kab<=j; kab=kab+2)
00323 
00324                         oneme[a+b*n][ap+bp*In[a].N][idx][idxjmk(j,ka,kb)] +=
00325                           ovlbme[a+n*ab][ap+Inb[ab].idx[abp]*In[a].N][idx][idxjmk(j,ka,kab)]*
00326                           obbcovl[idxjm(j,kab)+idxab*(j+1)][idxjm(j,kb)+idxb*(j+1)];
00327                     }
00328                 }
00329             }
00330         }
00331 
00332     }
00333 
00334 
00335   // expectation values of one operator
00336 
00337   fprintf(stderr, "... calculate expectation values\n");
00338 
00339   complex double **oneexp = initprojectedVector(&Povl, &OpOne, dim);
00340   calcexpectprojectedMultiMBME(&Povl, &OpOne, oneme, Q, In, n, &E, oneexp);
00341 
00342   // output
00343 
00344   char outfile[1024];
00345   FILE* outfp;
00346 
00347   snprintf(outfile, 1024, "%s.basisovlap-%s",
00348            stripstr(multiconfigfile, ".states"), basisfile);
00349   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00350     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00351     exit(-1);
00352   }
00353 
00354   fprintinfo(outfp);
00355 
00356   writeprojectedOvlaps(outfp, &Povl, oneexp, &E);
00357 
00358   fclose(outfp);
00359 
00360   return 0;
00361 }
